original_title: 2024 Presidential Election to be held on September 21
original_body_lines: The Election Commission of Sri Lanka has issued the Gazette notification announcing that the date of the 2024 Presidential Election and the date for the accepting of nominations.
Accordingly, the Presidential Election will be held on 21 September, 2024 and Nominations will be accepted on 15 August 2024, according to the Gazette notification.
